title: Design/Engineering
description: Intuitive 3D design and product development solutions let you conceptualize, create, validate, communicate, manage, and transform your innovative ideas into great product designs. Shorten product development time, reduce costs, and improve quality.

title: Simulation
description: Predict productâ€™s real-world physical behavior to raise quality while reducing prototyping and physical testing costs. Simulate the fluid flow, heat transfer, and fluid forces that are critical to the success of your designs. Assess product performance and quality under static, thermal and buckling conditions.

title: Manufacturing/Production
description: The world is experiencing a global transformation in the way we invent, learn, produce and trade. New categories of innovators are creating new categories of sustainable experiences for new categories of consumers. These consumers are demanding sustainable product experiences; and companies need to reinvent to answer these needs. It starts with sustainable manufacturing.
